title: Bon Jovi - Sessions From The Vault (Disc 2) - 320kbps
description:
1. Message - Pessimistic Man [Demo]
2. Message - Swing [Demo] 
3. Message - Lessons [Demo] 
4. Message - It Won&#039;t Be Long [Demo] 
5. Message - Is There Love [Demo] 
6. Message - Any Other Girl [Demo] 
7. Bon Jovi - Summertime Blues [Rehearsal Demo] 
8. Bon Jovi - American Dream [Rehearsal Demo] 
9. Bon Jovi - Tonight [Rehearsal Demo] #1 
10. Bon Jovi - Tonight [Rehearsal Demo] #2 
11. Bon Jovi - Promises [Rehearsal Demo] 
12. Bon Jovi - Better Think Twice [Rehearsal Demo] #1 
13. Bon Jovi - Better Think Twice [Rehearsal Demo] #2 
14. Bon Jovi - Stay [Rehearsal Demo] 
15. Bon Jovi - Jon&#039;s Guitar Doodle 
16. Bon Jovi - Heartbreaker [Rehearsal Demo] 
17. Bon Jovi - Head Over Heels [Rehearsal Demo] 
18. Bon Jovi - Broke My Heart [Rehearsal Demo]

-Tracks 1 - 6: before Bon Jovi existed, Richie Sambora (guitar) and Alec John Such (bass) played and recorded with a short lived band called "Message". These 4 tracks were demoed for what was to become their only pre-Bon Jovi album, the 4 track EP, "Lessons".

-Tracks 7 - 18: Jon recorded this rehearsal of his first Jam session with Richie on board, as they prepared to begin the writing sessions for thier first album which was originally to be called "Tough Talk".

The quality on tracks 7 - 18 are really quite bad, and I would recommend that only the diehards download them.
